content.name: p
children: By the end of this walkthrough you will have setup your account, generated and API key and installed your plugin.

content.name: p
children: and navigate to your settings, where your api keys live. Click generate API Key, you will be presented with two different keys. One is your
key which is your personal secret that you store somewhere safe and

api key. This is the one you will be using for your plugin. Make sure for your newly created api_key that you set up any additional domains besides your organizational domain are assigned to that api key.

content.name: p
children: Installing your plugin is as simple as dropping in this snippet in your website.

content.name: Fence
children:
<script type="module">
      import('https://beset-js.s3.amazonaws.com/BesetJS.es.js').then(async ({BesetWidget}) => {
          const widget = new BesetWidget({
            publicKey: "YOUR_API_KEY",
            inlinePlayerElement: document.getElementById("target-dom_element")
          })
          await widget.mount();
      })
</script>

content.name: p
children: If you refresh your page your integration will appear. And Hooray like that your pages will start to be transcribed.

content.name: p
children: We batch transcribe all your content on first load, we aim for fast transcriptions. Once transcribed your content will be available in multiple languages for a global audience. If you have any questions feel free to reach out to us!

frontmatter.title: Installation & Setup
frontmatter.description: Install your plugin and setup your account
